src:
Pobeda protiv Zvezde ništa ne garantuje, otkaz u Novom Mestu
05 Nov 2019, 11:11 by Nemanja
Košarkaški klub Krka sporazumno je raskinuo saradnju sa dosadašnjim trenerom Simonom Petrovom, objavljeno je danas.
U slovenačkom klubu nisu bili zadovoljni rezultatima kluba, pa čak ni pobeda nad Crvenom zvezdom u trećem kolu ABA lige nije pomogla, te je stoga uručen otkaz Petrovu.
 – Rezultati u poslednje vreme su nas naterali na ovu odluku. Klub i trener su se dogovorili da se saradnja završi. Želim da zahvalim Simonu za njegov posvećen rad i rezultate koje je ostvario sa timom. Sa njm na klupi vratili smo se u elitu iz ABA 2 lige. On će ostati legenda našeg kluba i želimo mu sve najbolje u daljem toku karijere – rekao je predsednik kluba iz Malog Mesta Andraž Šuštaršič.
U prvih pet utakmica ove sezone, Krka ima skor od dve pobede i tri poraza.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Victory against the Star guarantees nothing, cancellation in Novo Mesto
05 Nov 2019, 11:11 by Nemanja
The Krka Basketball Club has mutually terminated its cooperation with former coach Simon Petrov, it was announced today.
The Slovenian club were not satisfied with the results of the club, and even the victory over Red Star in the third round of the ABA league did not help, and therefore was fired Petrov.
- The results have recently led us to make this decision. The club and coach agreed to end the collaboration. I want to thank Simon for his dedicated work and the results he has achieved with the team. With him on the bench, we are back in the elite of the ABA 2 league. He will remain a legend of our club and we wish him all the best in his further career - said the president of the club from Mali, Andraž Šuštaršič.
In the first five games of the season, Krka has scored two wins and three losses.
